"Item Pack":
" By selecting \"Item Pack\" from the Item menu, you can check, use and organize the items you own. The \"Item Details\" window shows details for whatever item you currently have selected.

You can switch to viewing items you have in Storage with アイテムメニュー上部の“アイテムパック”にカーソルを合わせて、
で、表示内容を各倉庫に切り替えることができます。"
